title: This isn't something I'd post to Facebook, so I'll do it here as a relatively anonymous entity.
body:
I've noticed that, somehow, opposite extremes and not shades of grey voted the LNP Governments into parliament at both State and Federal level. The middle class - not upper, upper-middle, lower or lower-middle class voted for ALP whereas only those who see financial benefit from voting LNP and lazy dole bludgers who blamed the ALP for their... laziness.

Just something I've noticed seeing responses of a political nature on facebook recently. Honestly, just take a look at the Display Pictures of people who write any post that favors right-wing politics - they're either obvious mid-30/40s bogans or stuck-up rich kids or their parents.

replies.body:
Don't use facebook, I like many people do have an account yes, but I barely use it.

Even when I do it's either because 

1. Uni work demands, or
2. I am really, really bored.

Ignore the fools and keep your coolz, you feel better that way.

And don't get too heated up on politics. No politics is ever clean, because then it wouldn't be all talk.
